page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: 1 SLURRY TANKER FERTILISER SPREADER,CAMBRIDGE ROLLER. BURNS FARM,EAST KESWICK. THIS IS A STUD FARM (HORSES)WITH 1 TENANT FARMER AND 4 FARMWORKERS.THE 98 ACRES ARE USED FOR GRAZING AND HAY.THEY OWN 1 TRACTOR AND TRAILER,HARROWS,ROLLER,VOTEX CUTTER,FERTILISER SPREADER.THERE ARE 2 DWELLING HOUSES,3 STORAGE BARNS AND 2 ANIMAL SHELTERS. WITH MANY SMALL FARMS BECOMING UNECONOMIC THIS FARMER SPECIALISES IN BREEDING RACEHORSES FOR SURVIVAL. CARTHICK HOUSE FARM,KEARBY. THIS IS OWNED BY THE FARMER.HE HAS ONE HELPER.THE LAND OF 70 ACRES IS USED MOSTLY FOR GRAZING AND HAY.THE FARMER OWNS 60 BULLOCKS AND HEIFERS,VARIOUS PIECES OF MACHINERY,TRACTOR TRAILER,DIGGER,WUFFLER AND CATTLE TRUCK.
